item.description: HBA Boston: The Future of Medicine: Diagnostics and Personalized Medicine When:              February 15 from 5:30 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. Where:             Amgen, Inc                        360 Binney St (One Kendall Square, Building 1000)                        Cambridge, MA  02142 Website:          http://www.hbanet.org/home.aspx The use of diagnostics and personalized medicine and their potential to revolutionize the medical field is an evolving story. What is the state of the art in diagnostics? What can we really expect from personalized medicine and what are its limitations? What is its role in the future of medicine? Join us for an engaging panel discussion with experts across R&D for the details of clinical test development, diagnostics, and personalized medicine. We will learn how biomarker tests are developed in the laboratory, how the tests move to the clinic, the challenges associated with coordinating development between diagnostics and therapeutic partners, regulatory hurdles involved with diagnostics, the ethics involved with diagnostics and personalized medicine, and more.
